1.title: Let the Games Begin
1.plot: Kirk and Rasheeda deal with the long awaited DNA test results. Stevie clashes with Estelita and tries to replace her with a new first lady of Danger Zone. A new face in the A causes a splash on the scene.

2.title: Oh Baby
2.plot: The Frost family is shook by Jasmine's pop up at Pressed. Erica mixes it up with old friends, ex friends, and a new love interest. Sierra's smitten with her new boo, but a revelation about her estranged husband leaves her heartbroken.

3.title: Beginnings & Endings
3.plot: Sierra and Shooter's marital drama is put on pause by a shocking death in the family. Dime takes a pregnancy test. Estelita gets the courage to confront Stevie. Tommie and Spice share a heart to heart.

4.title: Do It for Finesse
4.plot: Kirk and Jasmine come face to face for the first time in a year. Samantha pushes Tommie to make up with her sister Versace. Karlie finds herself in a new role as caretaker for her sick father. Shooter leans on friends while grieving his son.

5.title: Dangerous Liaisons
5.plot: Stevie stuns his family with a shocking announcement. Mimi and Keely attempt to mediate between Stevie's artists. Karlie encourages Rasheeda to date her hunky new trainer. Dime hears her baby's heartbeat for the first time.

6.title: I'm Telling
6.plot: Just Brittany's comment leaves Erica furious. Kelsie encourages Kirk to get his family back before it's too late. Keely comes for Sierra's clique. Momma Dee is back and going under the knife. KK gets a shocking update about Scrapp.

7.title: Showing Out
7.plot: Just Brittany and Keely's friendship goes up in flames. Rasheeda sets clear boundaries for Kirk. Stevie wins Estelita back over to the good guy's team. Tokyo and Sierra plot to take down Keely. And Momma Dee opens up about her marital issues.

8.title: Tokyo Insanity
8.plot: Scrappy and Bambi are back in the A, and Momma Dee is already meddling in the newlyweds' affairs. A brawl breaks out at Tokyo's album release party. Tokyo suspects Tabius is cheating on her. Dime has an emotional conversation with her estranged mom.

9.title: Team Rasheeda
9.plot: Upset with Kirk, Jasmine plans another pop up but she gets confronted by Rasheeda's friends. Tommie and Spice butt heads. Sierra learns that BK's been keeping secrets. Keely and Bleu have an emoional sit down. The Frost family has an unexpected loss.

10.title: The Friendtervention
10.plot: Sierra is furious when Karlie confronts her with BK's side chicks. Kirk's grief brings him and Rasheeda back together. Bleu has an emotional reunion with his son. Mena judges Estelita's choice to rekindle her romantic relationship with Stevie.

11.title: Houston We Have A Problem
11.plot: Rasheeda takes the whole crew to Houston for her new store's grand opening. Tommie has a meltdown that leaves her friends and colleagues wondering if she's okay. Sean and Karlie butt heads over her messy ways. Dime finds out the gender of her baby

12.title: Don't Mess with Texas
12.plot: The drama in Houston continues when the rest of the crew arrives. Tokyo and Spice come face to face. Joc and Karlie enjoy some vacation flirtation. Rasheeda's on cloud nine about her store opening, but an uninvited guest threatens to spoil the night.

13.title: Cowgirls Gone Wild
13.plot: Finished with their business in Houston, the crew heads to the dude ranch. Rasheeda hopes everyone can put their drama to the side to enjoy the trip, but Spice and Tokyo quickly get back into it. The other girls start taking sides, new beefs arise.

14.title: Horsing Around
14.plot: The drama at the dude ranch continues when the group goes horseback riding. BK makes a romantic gesture to win Sierra back. Joc and Karlie continue to rekindle their friendship. Back in Atlanta, Tommie faces her demons.

15.title: Showing Off
15.plot: The crew is back from Texas, and Estelita is back to work with Stevie prepping for the big Danger Zone showcase. Kirk reunites with Kannon, and Rasheeda is upset when she learns about it on social media. Sierra and Shooter finalize their divorce.

16.title: Peace & Blessings
16.plot: Shooter puts together a big anti-violence rally to honor his late son. Dime's baby shower takes a turn when Stevie and Sean Garrett argue. Stevie enlists Rich Dollaz to get back at Erica. Tommie reconnects with the group and Dime gives birth!

17.title: Reunion - Part 1
17.plot: The cast reunites and the drama becomes too much for one OG cast member. Rasheeda lets Jasmine know what she really thinks about her apology, and Joc & Karlie let slip some steamy details from the dude ranch. Things go left between Spice and Tommie.

18.title: Reunion - Part 2
18.plot: Tensions reach a boiling point between Spice and Tommie. Tokyo makes it known she's ready to read anyone who comes for Tabius. Just when BK Brasco thought he was in the clear, his past catches up with him and has Sierra second guessing everything.

1.title: The 'A' List
1.plot: Stevie J presents a new home to Mimi too far from Atlanta for her comfort. Do his studio sessions with Joseline involve more than just business? Scrappy tells Erica he isn't sure about their relationship. K.Michelle celebrates her birthday.

2.title: Pregnito
2.plot: Stevie tries to make up with Mimi, but she hits him right where it hurts - his wallet. Joseline accuses Karlie of being a snitch and tells her she'll decide if and when Karlie can work with Stevie.

3.title: Kiss and Yell
3.plot: K. Michelle is fighting to get over her past and pours her heart out at a showcase. Scrappy confides in Momma Dee that he wants to move out of Erica's house and move on. Joseline drops a bombshell that could affect Stevie and Mimi's relationship.

4.title: Scrappin
4.plot: Joseline is faced with making the toughest decision of her life. Mimi finds Stevie waiting on her doorsteps for a surprising confession. Scrappy checks Stevie for disrespecting Erica at K. Michelle's showcase and all hell breaks loose.

5.title: No Receipts
5.plot: Mimi takes a big step in her relationship with Stevie J. Scrappy has a health scare that has an emotional affect on his future with Erica. K. Michelle finally confronts Karlie on her disrespectful ways and the two have it out.

6.title: No Apologies
6.plot: Stevie checks Joseline for being out of line with Mimi. Rasheeda is fed up with Kirk's management and seeks advice from a competing manager. Joseline and Mimi sit down and address their latest issue.

7.title: Therapy
7.plot: Karlie gets an ultimatum from her management which puts stress on her relationship with Benzino. Stevie makes a last ditch suggestion to Mimi to save their relationship. Rasheeda and Kirk make a tough decision about Kirk's place in her career.

8.title: Threes Company
8.plot: Stevie gives Mimi an indecent proposal in an effort to save their relationship. Erica receives some disturbing news from K. Michelle. Rasheeda inadvertently betrays Kirk and the two have it out.

9.title: Loyalty Card
9.plot: Erica confronts Scrappy about Shay. Benzino and Karlie romantic date takes a left turn. Rasheeda questions K. Michelle about her domestic abuse story.

10.title: Smoke and Mirrors
10.plot: Mimi, Stevie J and Joseline return to counseling. Erica makes a decision about her relationship with Scrappy. Benzino sets up proposal to Karlie.

11.title: The Reunion Part 1
11.plot: The drama continues when the ladies and gentlemen of Love and Hip Hop Atlanta reunite. Together with the host and executive producer Mona Scott Young, the cast will go over past beefs and triumphs.

12.title: The Reunion Part 2
12.plot: The drama continues when the ladies and gentlemen of Love and Hip Hop Atlanta reunite. Together with the host and executive producer Mona Scott Young, the cast will go over past beefs and triumphs.

13.title: Dirty Little Secrets
13.plot: Mona Scott-Young hosts this hour-long humorous and entertaining Special, packed with never-before-seen deleted scenes and extended footage from Season One and the Reunion. Including an in-depth look at the notorious Stevie J, Lil Scrappy fight, and featuring all new cast interviews to find out what life is like for them now that the show has hit it big.

101.title: Meet the Cast
101.plot: Meet the cast of VH1's newest series, Love & Hip Hop: Atlanta.

1.title: Back in the 'A'
1.plot: Mimi celebrates new beginnings, but has she really turned the page on Stevie J.? Momma Dee schemes to get Scrappy away from Erica. K.Michelle takes a big step forward with her career. Joseline disrespects Mimi and Stevie pays for it.

2.title: She Loves Me Not
2.plot: Joseline wants Stevie J. to cut out the shenanigans. Drew needs Traci's help to stay in Atlanta with their child. Momma Dee springs her trap on Scrappy. Mimi tells Stevie it's time for her to move out.

3.title: Dinner Beef
3.plot: Mimi's housewarming party gets way too hot. Rasheeda considers guesting on a K. Michelle diss song. Karlie tells Joseline a scandalous rumor about Benzino. Scrappy, Erica, and Momma Dee try to make peace over dinner... but all hell breaks lose.

4.title: He Said, She Said
4.plot: Erica tells Scrappy she wants to pump the brakes on their engagement. Stevie and Joseline confront Benzino about the rumors he's been spreading. Traci's issues with Drew erupt when she finds a woman in his apartment.

5.title: Baggage
5.plot: Joseline takes Stevie's new artist down a peg. Erica shows Scrappy her ringless finger. Mimi introduces her new man to K.Michelle and Ariane. Rasheeda gets big news from her doctor.

6.title: Making a Scene
6.plot: Rasheeda is shocked at Kirk's reaction when she tells him she's pregnant. Joseline doesn't want Stevie working with anyone but her. K. Michelle and Ariane fight with Mimi's boyfriend. Traci tries to stop Drew from staffing the store with nothing but hot girls.

7.title: N.Y. State of Mind
7.plot: Mimi and Ariane travel to New York to fix things with K. Michelle. Joseline lashes out at Stevie's new artist. Drew gives Traci some devastating news about their business. Rasheeda and Kirk worry how the pregnancy will effect their finances. Momma Dee turns up the heat on a new friend.

8.title: Come to Daddy
8.plot: Stevie wants Joseline to apologize, but Joseline's jealous nature might destroy their whole relationship instead. Shay regrets letting Scrappy back into her life and her bed. Kirk interrupts Rasheeda's photoshoot with questions about the pregnancy. Mimi's doubts about Nikko start to surface.

9.title: The Keymaster
9.plot: Stevie drives a wedge between Mimi and Nikko. K.Michelle vows to stop brawling when her label tells her she's putting her career in jeopardy, but it isn't long before Karlie puts her to the test. Rasheeda's mother goes in on Kirk.

10.title: A Failed Test
10.plot: Scrappy is accused of violating his probation; will he wind up back in jail? Mimi has had more than enough of her boyfriend Nikko. Pregnant Rasheeda films a sexy video against Kirk's wishes. Erica and Shay get heated at Karlie's event.

11.title: Mistake at the Lake
11.plot: A weekend at a lake house turns wild and Kirk ends up in hot water. Joseline reveals she wants more from Stevie. Drew tries to woo Traci away from her new boyfriend. Scrappy makes a difficult choice.

12.title: Turnt Up
12.plot: Rasheeda confronts Kirk over his wild ways. Joseline pushes Stevie for more commitment. With Scrappy in prison, Erica takes drastic measures for financial security. Ariane auditions to sing back up on K.Michelle's tour.

13.title: Up in Flames
13.plot: Scrappy faces his addiction problems head on. Will Drew do serious damage to Traci's new relationship? Joseline makes a surprise purchase. Rasheeda and her mom face off against Kirk with explosive results.

14.title: Boriqua
14.plot: Joseline surprises Stevie with a gift and a trip. Mimi gets a "Mommy Makeover" while Rasheeda makes a fateful decision whether she stays with Kirk. Scrappy tries to resolve things with Erica before he goes to rehab.

15.title: Lord Of The Rings
15.plot: In the season finale, Kirk makes a big attempt to save his marriage. Erica and Momma Dee visit Scrappy in rehab. K.Michelle makes a major announcement. Stevie risks it all to get everything he wants from Joseline and Mimi.

16.title: Reunion: Part 1
16.plot: Sparks fly when the ladies of Love and Hip Hop Atlanta reunite to settle their beefs. Mimi and Joseline call out Stevie about his double proposal. Erica and Scrappy discuss the end of their engagement. Rasheeda confronts Kirk about his betrayal.

17.title: Reunion: Part 2
17.plot: The drama continues when the entire cast of Love and Hip Hop Atlanta reunites. Rasheeda reveals the status of her relationship with Kirk. Stevie makes it rain on Nikko. Scrappy squirms in the hot seat between Erica and Shay.

1.title: The Next Chapter
1.plot: Stevie and Joseline celebrate the next step in their relationship, while Kirk and Rasheeda take two steps back. Momma Dee takes a bite out of Scrappy's new love interest. Waka Flocka promises to be faithful to Tammy, and Nikko puts Mimi in a compromising position for the whole world to see.

2.title: Leaked
2.plot: When Stevie gets word of Mimi's new found infamy...there is hell to pay. Scrappy tries to juggle all of the ladies in his life. Karlie imposes ground rules on her new man, Yung Joc. Kirk sets out to prove whether or not he is the father of Rasheeda's baby...and Benzino helps him cover it up.

3.title: The Results Are In
3.plot: When Mimi learns that Nikko spilled her sex tape secret to Stevie, she's furious. Stevie and Joseline throw a Dinner Party (with a side of interrogation) for Benzino and his new girlfriend, while Scrappy & Bambi deal with a new development in their relationship. Kirk receives the results of his DNA Test, and Karlie's plan to move in with Yung Joc come to a screeching halt.

4.title: New Help
4.plot: Stevie and Joseline put their big wedding plans on hold to handle some business, which blows up in Stevie's face. Bambi suffers a set back. Kirk takes the search for a nanny into his own hands. Karlie and Joc go from breakup to makeup to bust.

5.title: Party Foul
5.plot: Dawn and Mimi are on a mission to bring Stevie J and Joseline down. Karlie and Yung Joc continue their roller coaster relationship. Rasheeda pays a visit to Kirk's young and sexy nanny candidate. And when Scrappy's 30th Birthday party puts his two ladies at odds, things turn ugly.

6.title: What's Your Position
6.plot: Mimi and Dawn continue their quest to expose Stevie J and Joseline. Momma Dee tries to make peace between Erica P and Bambi, but only wages a new war. When Rasheeda hits a studio slump, Kirk is to blame. And when Joseline gets word that Tammy was talking smack behind her back, the Puerto Rican Princess takes no prisoners.

7.title: The Past, My Ass
7.plot: Stevie J and Benzino take on their newest venture, but when Karlie and Althea have a run in at their grand opening, it all goes down in flames.

8.title: Change of Course
8.plot: Stevie tries to apologize to Joseline. Erica's steamy romance with O'Shea starts to fizzle. Mimi and Nikko butt heads over Althea. Rasheeda, Karlie and Kalenna take a "girls trip" to New Orleans. And a secret jeopardizes Kirk's marriage.

9.title: Three Way, No Way
9.plot: Joseline's suspicions over Stevie's fidelity reach a fever pitch. Kirk and Rasheeda take the next step in their relationship, while Kalenna's house guest causes problems.

10.title: A Bullet in the Arm
10.plot: Joseline makes a discovery about Stevie's past. Meanwhile, Tammy and Waka cope with a death; Mimi gets a peek at her sex-tape trailer; and Benzino deals with a vicious attack.

11.title: Round and Round We Go
11.plot: Tammy and Waka reach a major milestone without the support of their family, while Joseline gives Stevie a new ultimatum. Scrappy's attempt at a peace treaty with Erica Pinkett leads to an all out war, and Benzino take his relationship with Althea to new heights.

12.title: Release Day
12.plot: Mimi's sex tape is released; Kirk's apology party goes bad; Karlie faces Althea; Scrappy does damage control; Joseline leaves Stevie unraveled.

13.title: Life Happens
13.plot: Mimi gets a spot on the cover of Stevie's magazine, irritating Joseline; Kalenna and Tony make a discovery; Bambi gets a proposition.

14.title: Loss for Words
14.plot: Stevie deals with the fallout from Mimi's magazine cover; Mimi spirals; Kalenna and Tony worry.

15.title: Blast from the Past
15.plot: Karlie and Joc reach a breaking point in their relationship. Benzino attempts to secure his future with Althea. Momma Dee and Erica try to mend old wounds, and Mimi makes a shocking discovery about Nikko's past.

16.title: La La Land
16.plot: The discovery of Nikko's marriage leaves Mimi wanting answers. Tammy takes fertility matters into her own hands. Karlie serves Joc with the ultimate revenge, and Stevie takes a trip to LA to record with Snoop Dogg.

17.title: Over and Out
17.plot: Benzino outs Joseline, leaving his relationship with Stevie in question. Waka is dealt surprising news that threatens his future with Tammy. Mimi makes a final decision about her future with Nikko.

18.title: Reunion Part 1
18.plot: The cast of Love and Hip Hop Atlanta reunites as host Sommore revisits all the explosive drama from Season 3. Things take a turn for the worse when the tensions between Stevie J, Joseline, Benzino and Althea get physical.

19.title: Reunion - Part 2
19.plot: The fighting continues between Joseline and her cast mates, both on and off stage. The cast reflects on how things went so horribly wrong at the reunion and who is to blame.

20.title: Reunion (Part 3)
20.plot: Mimi and Nikko reveal the status of their relationship. Stevie J, Joseline, Benzino and Althea recap the fight at the reunion from their point of views.

1.title: The Danger Zone
1.plot: Stevie J's bad behavior leaves Mimi's newest business venture in jeopardy. Erica struggles with Scrappy over child support. Kirk lands a new "office" and a new artist right under Rasheeda's nose. Nikko tries to mend his broken relationships and everyone wonders, "where's Joseline?".

2.title: Say Goodbye
2.plot: Yung Joc tries to juggle new love with an old flame. Rasheeda gets some alarming information from Kirk's new artist. Nikko solidifies his business relationship with Mimi through a series of threats, and Joseline returns just in time for Stevie's dramatic exit.

3.title: Rehabilitation
3.plot: Erica makes moves that threaten to land Scrappy behind bars. Sina plans to win back Yung Joc by any means necessary. Karlie's grand opening goes up in flames, along with several of her friendships. Stevie J enters rehab leaving Joseline and Mimi face to face, and toe to toe.

4.title: Cuffed Up
4.plot: Khadiyah puts Yung Joc in a compromising position after Sina presents her with incriminating evidence. Margeaux arrives in Atlanta and forms an unlikely friendship. Kalenna prepares for the arrival of her baby.

5.title: Rumor Has It...
5.plot: Margeaux and Joseline fire up rumors about Mimi's role in the sex tape controversy. Momma Dee receives an offer she has to refuse. Rasheeda learns Kirk is over budget and out of excuses. Mimi invites Jessica Dime and Tiffany Foxx to a studio session with Jazze Pha, leaving the future of MF management in doubt.

6.title: Face the Music
6.plot: Momma Dee holds court to air out the grievances in the palace. Stevie J's future remains in the balance as he heads to NY to face his day in court. Kirk's artist rubs Rasheeda the wrong way.

7.title: Three-Ring Circus
7.plot: Margeaux and Nikko continue to tear down Mimi's side of the sex tape saga. Kirk discovers Rasheeda's plans to auction off his assets. Joc attempts to smooth things over with Khadiyah, and when Joseline discovers that Stevie has been working with other artists, she makes a big splash at home.

8.title: The Truth Hurts
8.plot: Kalenna & Tony make a major investment with their life savings. Khadiyah comes face to face with Yung Joc's exes. Kirk tries to broker peace between Ashley and Rasheeda. Joseline needs Stevie's help, so she's ready to sit down and talk. And Mimi is ready to make a big confession.

9.title: I Deserve
9.plot: Mimi finally comes clean to her best friend Ariane. Joseline and Stevie perform at the opening of Tony and Kalenna's club. Margeaux drops a huge bomb on Nikko. Khadiyah has big news for Yung Joc, and Momma Dee gets the surprise of her life during Sunday church service.

10.title: Friends with Benefits
10.plot: Yung Joc tries to make amends with Khadiyah. Kalenna searches for a new manager. And Jessica Dime spills some MAJOR tea about her old friend Joseline, leading to a showdown between them at last.

11.title: On the Road
11.plot: Joseline and Stevie go to LA to work on a business deal. Jessica Dime and Margueax show off their skills at open mic night. Mimi and Dawn fight over MF Management, and Rasheeda loses her mind when she thinks Kirk is cheating on her with his new artist.

12.title: Blast from the Past
12.plot: Rasheeda and Erica confront Kirk and his new artist. Scrappy has a surprise for Bambi. Joc commits to Khadiyah once and for all, and Kalenna and Deb fall out, prompting a surprise visit from an old "friend".

13.title: Revenge
13.plot: Stevie tries to give Nikko a taste of his own medicine. Karlie and Sina plan revenge on Khadiyah. Rasheeda and Kalenna have a falling out as Kalenna confronts a serious medical issue.

14.title: Countdown
14.plot: Margeaux confronts Joseline and Stevie about their shady business dealings. Kirk and Tony try to broker the peace between Rasheeda and Kalenna. Scrappy is thrown for a loop when Bambi shoots a steamy video behind his back, and Khadiyah has it out with Yung Joc, prompting him to seek out his old flame Karlie.

15.title: Doing Me
15.plot: Joseline branches out musically, going behind Stevie's back to record a hot new track. Momma Dee starts preparing for her dream wedding, endangering her relationships with her family in the process. Margeaux and Jessica Dime bond over their shared interests in 'Starting a War', which is exactly what Jessica Dime does when she finds herself face to face with Tiffany Foxx.

16.title: Bait and Switch
16.plot: Kirk plans a massive surprise for Rasheeda. Scrappy threatens to abdicate the throne on the eve of Momma Dee's wedding. Kalenna and Tony meet with a therapist. Stevie takes the guys on a farewell fishing trip and discovers a secret about Joseline. And Jessica Dime enlists Margeaux's help to get vengeance on Mimi.

17.title: I Do
17.plot: Momma Dee's royal wedding day arrives, but her children may not show up for her crowning moment. Margeaux reveals a secret to Nikko that turns his world upside down. Stevie makes a big decision and surprises Mimi with a proposition, while Joseline gives her big performance without her husband by her side.

18.title: Reunion - Part 1
18.plot: The cast of Love and Hip Hop Atlanta reunites for the first time since last year's dramatic reunion. Mimi takes care of unfinished business and things get heated between Nikko and Stevie.

19.title: Reunion Part 2
19.plot: When Love & Hip Hop Atlanta the Reunion continues, Joseline drops a huge bomb on Mimi as Scrappy unloads on Erica. Rasheeda and Joseline square off while a revelation from Momma Dee leaves the cast speechless. Stevie and Joseline bless the mic with a performance that's not to be missed. Plus, the most shocking reunion moment Atlanta history.

1.title: Of Kings And Queens
1.plot: Mimi's new relationship has everyone in Atlanta buzzing. Momma Dee snuffs out treason after Rasheeda and Kirk leave Scrappy high and dry. New on the scene, the King family has everyone on edge, as Tiara and Tommie compete to be Scrapp DeLeon's queen.

2.title: Full Disclosure
2.plot: Chaos ensues between Tommie and Tiarra at Mimi's party. Tiarra confronts Scrapp with an ultimatum. Tammy discovers some surprising news about a new model that she wants to hire.

3.title: Daddy's Home
3.plot: Tammy's luncheon with D.Smith and Betty turns left. Stevie J is back from his Hollywood adventures in LA. Waka Flocka returns to the ATL for an event. Scrapp sets up a meeting with Tiarra and Tommie.

4.title: Blackmail
4.plot: Joseline returns to Atlanta with a vengeance. Scrappy and Rasheeda hash out their issues. Karlie lets it all hang out with Lyfe Jennings. K.Michelle pops up, and Scrapp DeLeon pops off at KK over her relationship with Tiarra.

5.title: Watch Your Back
5.plot: Joseline dishes on Karlie Redd, Stevie J and KK. Kirk's daughter asks for help with her music career. Tommie's suspicions about Scrapp come to a fever pitch, and Mimi agonizes over Stevie J and Chris coming face to face for the first time.

6.title: Mother of All Problems
6.plot: A surprise guest at Joseline's party leaves everyone at odds. Scrappy discovers Bambi's extracurricular activities. The King Family is divided over loss. Deb Antney makes Momma Dee and Shirleen squash their beef once and for all.

7.title: Playing with Fire
7.plot: Karlie cozies up to a new man. Stevie J threatens to sever ties with Joseline, and turns to an old friend for support. K.Michelle is back in town. Mimi and Chris come to a crossroads. Jessica Dime fans the flames between Bambi and Scrappy.

8.title: Common Ground
8.plot: Scrapp DeLeon receives devastating legal news. K.Michelle's listening party brings her toe to toe with D. Smith and Betty Idol. Jessica Dime takes her relationship with Scrappy to the next level. Tiarra and KK try to find common ground, despite their crumbling relationship.

9.title: Free at Last
9.plot: Deb's panel discussion on bullying has a surprising outcome. D. Smith helps Ariane find her voice. Scrapp has an emotional goodbye with his son, King, and spends his final night of freedom with his family.

10.title: Final Goodbye
10.plot: Deb's panel discussion on bullying has a surprising outcome. D. Smith helps Ariane find her voice. Scrapp has an emotional goodbye with his son, King, and spends his final night of freedom with his family.

11.title: Mystery Solved
11.plot: Scrapp faces his sentencing as his loved ones reflect on their future. Mimi and Stevie take a road trip to uncover the truth. Joseline makes a big confession. D. Smith and Scrappy face-off after his insensitive social media post.

12.title: Lovers or Friends?
12.plot: Tammy has to face the truth when Waka's indiscretions hit the blogs. While Joseline defends the legitimacy of her marriage, Stevie decides to work with one of her rivals. Joc violates the bro code as J-Nicks and Tiarra decide to take their relationship to the next level.

13.title: Funny Business
13.plot: Stevie and Joseline come face-to-face since separating. Joseline pushes the limits by inviting Tommie to join them. Stevie flaunts his new artist, Dime. Lyfe surprises Karlie with a ring. Rasheeda and Kirk have big plans for DLO that don't involve Kelsie. Momma Dee suspects Ernest is up to no good. D. Smith shares her music with CeeLo.

14.title: Confessions
14.plot: All hell breaks loose at Stevie's pool party when Karlie confesses to Tiarra and when Dime comes face-to-face with Joseline. Karlie and Lyfe end their relationship. K. Michelle takes Ariane under her wing. When Joc confesses his sins, J-Nicks comes up with a plan to surprise Amber. Scrappy tries to win back Bambi. Tammy and Deb share a tearful moment.

15.title: Heart to Heart
15.plot: KK extends an olive branch to Tiarra. Mimi decides to handle unfinished business with Chris. Scrappy turns to Tammy for advice on how to win back Bambi. Karlie confronts Lyfe about another secret she's uncovered. Joseline confronts Tommie about an incident in LA.

16.title: Final Outcome
16.plot: Stevie and Joseline's relationship comes to an end. Scrappy pops the question in front of family & friends. Momma Dee apologizes to Shirleen, and gives Ernest a gift that tests his commitment. KK and Tiarra plan a special birthday surprise for King. The real Tommie is revealed during a counseling session. K.Michelle asks Ariane for a favor. Joseline attends Ariane's listening party and all hell breaks loose.

17.title: Exposed and Unfiltered: Part 1
17.plot: Coming off of the most explosive Atlanta season to date, concerns of cast violence compel producers to reunite the cast in small groups at a secret location. Despite the intimate interviews, the drama is in full effect when Bambi and Betty Idol face off over Scrappy. Tommie gets word that her legal issues just got worse thanks to Joseline. Plus, Stevie and Joseline may be broken up for good but a shocking turn of events may tie them together forever.

18.title: Exposed and Unfiltered: Part 2
18.plot: The conflict continues on part two of "Exposed and Unfiltered" when cast members clash and secrets are revealed. Tommie lets everyone know the real reason why Scrapp hooked up with Karlie. While Tiarra will allow Scrapp to be in King's life, KK's shocking allegations may affect his relationship to his son forever. Plus, how will Stevie handle the rumors that Joseline is expecting his baby?

1.title: Who's Your Daddy
1.plot: Joseline and Stevie struggle over the paternity of her unborn child. Tommie faces legal problems. Karlie and Joc rekindle their old flame. Kirk and Rasheeda's marriage is placed in serious jeopardy.

2.title: Family Matters
2.plot: The Frosts, Kirk's alleged baby mama Jasmine, and her boyfriend Rod deal with the consequences of Jasmine's bomb drop. Joseline and Stevie meet for the first time in months. Momma Dee and Ernest deal with marital issues.

3.title: Sister Wives
3.plot: Rasheeda deals with Kirk's infidelity. Rod and Jasmine's unconventional relationship is revealed. Waka tries to make things right with Tammy. Tommie clashes with Karlie. Joseline attempts to resolve her paternity issues.

4.title: In with the New
4.plot: Tommie is mixing it up with new friends and, potentially, a new man. The end may be near for Scrappy and Bambi. Karlie finds out some shocking details about Jasmine, which prompts Joc to reveal a big secret.

5.title: War and Peace
5.plot: Joseline wants to gather friends and asks for Melissa's help. Joc and Karlie go on explosive double dates. Tresure and Tommie face off. Kirk continues to deal with the fallout of his infidelity. Moriah's married man is revealed.

6.title: Frenemies
6.plot: Joc confronts his ex Sina about her relationship with Rod. Moriah's married man is revealed. Joseline rekindles an old friendship. Stevie goes to great lengths to bring his family together.

7.title: Grapes of Wrath
7.plot: Tommie's new business venture has people wondering if she's making good decisions. Joseline and Stevie face off in court. Dime reveals she and Joseline have reconciled. Waka plots to fix his marriage. Sierra confronts Moriah.

8.title: In Due Time
8.plot: Tommie's wine tasting brings drama and a surprise guest. Scrappy holds Kirk to the fire on the paternity of baby Kannon. Karlie finds out some truths about Joc. Joseline prepares for the birth of Bonnie. Mimi confronts Melissa.

9.title: Bachelor Bash
9.plot: Stevie adjusts to being a new dad. Scrappy throws a party to celebrate his return to single life. Momma Dee and Shirleen team up to pry into Kirk's affairs. Waka makes a grand romantic gesture to win Tammy back.

10.title: Up in Flames
10.plot: Joseline is back in action after the birth of Bonnie Bella. Rasheeda confronts her mother about Scrappy's party. KK convinces Tommie and her mother to give their relationship another try. Joseline and Karlie come face to face.

11.title: Keep It Real
11.plot: Karlie and Joseline come to an understanding. Joseline goes to LA to co-host "The Real". Karlie seeks revenge against Joc. Dime reveals a secret about her love life. Stevie has a shocking proposal for Joseline.

12.title: Jamaican Flavor
12.plot: Waka moves back into the house but is surprised by Tammy's independence. Rasheeda is shocked by a surprise visitor who has news about Jasmine's baby. The girls' trip to Jamaica gets off to a rocky start with uninvited crashers.

13.title: Jamaican Me Crazy
13.plot: Kirk and Rasheeda finally talk. Dime gets the romantic surprise of a lifetime. Back in Atlanta, Jasmine gets an unwanted visit from her pesky ex-boyfriend. And Joseline reconsiders working things out with Stevie.

14.title: Reality Bites
14.plot: A phone call from home brings the Jamaica trip to an abrupt end. Rod checks Logan, but has questions for Jasmine. Joseline has a surprise proposal for Stevie. Karlie takes one relationship to the next level and destroys another.

15.title: When All Else Fails
15.plot: Stevie deals with the fallout of Joseline's botched apology to his daughters. Tommie and Dime agree to sit down to hash out their differences. Jasmine takes Kannon to get his DNA test. Kirk surprises Rasheeda on a cabin getaway.

16.title: The End Is Near
16.plot: Kirk reaches his breaking point and Rasheeda is rocked by DNA test results. Tommie and Samantha try to deal with their issues. Joseline wants Stevie to join her in NY and fire Estelita. Stevie makes a difficult decision.

17.title: Reunion - Part 1
17.plot: The cast reunites as host Nina Parker dives into the drama. Nobody knows if Joseline will confront her fellow cast. Lovely Mimi and Karlie exchange words. Stevie and Tommie spill the tea, but nothing compares to the tears shed for Rasheeda and Kirk.

18.title: Reunion - Part 2
18.plot: The drama continues with Joseline backstage. Things with KK and Tommie get heated after their social media fiasco. The cast discuss their Jamaican adventure and we find out what really happened on the trip with Karlie and Joc.

101.title: Joseline's Special Delivery
101.plot: From planning an over-the-top baby shower, to caring for an infant simulator, Joseline Hernandez enlists the help of family and friends to prepare her for the big day.

102.title: Dirty Little Secrets 2
102.plot: An intimate, scandalous and very funny look into the world of Love & Hip Hop Atlanta in which the cast and producers reveal some of the most surprising and jaw-dropping secrets from the hit series.

imdb.title: Love & Hip Hop: Atlanta
plot: Follows the lives of some elite women and men in Atlanta involved in the entertainment industry. It covers the drama that goes on with their friends, children, families and coworkers.
